trans-unit.source: Represents the Assertion element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.3.3].
trans-unit.target: 表示在 [Saml2Core，2.3.3] 中指定了 Assertion 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 SAML&2;.0 版核心规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref> class with the specified issuer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref>与指定的颁发者的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.IssueInstant%2A> property is set to the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that specifies the SAML authority that is making the claim(s) in the assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"> </xref> ，它指定断言中进行声明的 SAML 授权机构。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3].
issuer is .

Gets or sets additional information related to the assertion that assists processing in certain situations but which may be ignored by applications that do not understand the advice or do not wish to make use of it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与断言，以帮助相关的其他信息在某些情况下，但其可能被忽略的应用程序不处理了解建议或不希望使使用它。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Advice element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice"></xref> that contains additional information related to the assertion.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice"> </xref> ，包含与断言相关的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this assertion was deserialized from XML source and can re-emit the XML data unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否从 XML 源的反序列化此断言，并重新发出 XML 数据保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation preserves the source data when read using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.ReadAssertion%2A> method and can re-emit the original data as long as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id%2A> property has not changed from the time that assertion was read.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现保留时使用读取的源数据<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.ReadAssertion%2A>方法并重新发出原始数据长达<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id%2A>属性未更改从断言已读取的时间。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion.Id%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2SecurityTokenHandler.ReadAssertion%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > It is very important that SAML assertions with different data have different IDs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 一定要使用不同的数据的 SAML 断言有不同的 Id。

trans-unit.source: If implementing a scheme whereby an assertion "template" is loaded and certain bits of data are filled in, the Id must be changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现一种方案凭此断言"模板"已加载并且填充数据的某些位，则必须更改 Id。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this assertion can re-emit the XML source data unchanged; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此断言可以重新发出 XML 源数据保持不变;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the conditions that must be evaluated when assessing the validity of and/or when using the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在评估的有效性和/或使用断言时，必须进行评估的条件。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core 2.3.3]
The Conditions element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions"></xref> that contains the conditions.
Gets or sets the credentials used for encrypting the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于加密断言的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier in the encrypting credentials is used for the embedded <xref uid="langword_csharp_EncryptedKey" name="EncryptedKey" href=""></xref> in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EncryptedData" name="EncryptedData" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的加密凭据的密钥标识符的嵌入<xref uid="langword_csharp_EncryptedKey" name="EncryptedKey" href=""></xref>中<xref uid="langword_csharp_EncryptedData" name="EncryptedData" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials> that represents the credentials.
Gets or sets a collection that contains any additional encrypted keys that are specified external to the EncryptedData element, as children of the EncryptedAssertion element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个集合包含指定任何其他加密的密钥外部 EncryptedData 元素中，作为 EncryptedAssertion 元素的子级。

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that contains the keys.
Gets or sets the identifier for this assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此断言的标识符。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The ID attribute.
This attribute is required.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id"></xref> that represents the identifier.
An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 试图将属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time instant of issue in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的问题，即时时间以 UTC。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The IssueInstant attribute.
This attribute is required.
A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the time at which this assertion was issued in UTC.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>，它表示 UTC 从该处此断言的颁发的时间。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Gets or sets the identifier for the SAML authority that is making the claim(s) in the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断言中进行声明的 SAML 授权机构的标识符。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Issuer element.
This element is required.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2NameIdentifier"></xref> that specifies the issuer.
An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 试图将属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>时发生。

trans-unit.source: The credentials used by the issuer to protect the integrity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 颁发者用于保护断言的完整性的凭据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials"></xref> that represents the credentials.
Gets a collection that contains the statements regarding the subject made in this assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此断言中所做的使用者集合，包含的语句相关。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection can be of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement>, and/or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement> to represent each of the following SAML elements: AttributeStatement, AuthnStatement, and AuthzDecisionStatement.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的元素可以是类型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement>， <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement>，和/或<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement>来表示每个以下的 SAML 元素︰ AttributeStatement、 AuthnStatement 和 AuthzDecisionStatement。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthorizationDecisionStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AuthenticationStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AttributeStatement>

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement"></xref> that contains the statements for this assertion.
trans-unit.target: 类型的集合<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Statement"> </xref> ，其中包含此断言的语句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the subject of the statement(s) in the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断言中的语句的主题。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Subject element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Subject"></xref> that specifies the subject.
Gets the SAML version of this assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取此断言的 SAML 版本。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.3.3]
The Version attribute; only version "2.0" is supported.
A string that contains the version.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含的版本。

trans-unit.source: Writes the source data, if available.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> with which to write the source data.
No source data is available
